name: Stripe Donation Backend Server
description: A one-shot ruby application server for simple Stripe donations.

STRIPE_KEYS.description: Your public/private Stripe API keys, separated by a colon.

STRIPE_CHARGE_DESC.description: Optional description attached to Stripe email receipts.

CORS_ACCEPT_DOMAIN.description: Value to set for the `Access-Control-Allow-Origin` header.

PUSHOVER_USER_KEY.description: Optional Pushover.net user key for push notifications.

PUSHOVER_APP_TOKEN.description: Optional Pushover.net application token for push notifications.

PUSHOVER_DEVICE.description: Optional device name for Pushover.net; only this device will receive notifications.

PUSH_ON_SUCCESS.description: Send push notifications when a successful donation occurs.

PUSH_ON_FAILURE.description: Send push notifications when an error occurs.

MAILGUN_API_KEY.description: Optional mailgun API key for error reports.

MAILGUN_DOMAIN.description: If you're using mailgun, set this to the domain hosting this app; e.g. `donate.foobar.org` after registering it in Mailgun

MAILGUN_FROM_ADDR.description: The from address for emails, e.g. `robot@donate.foobar.org`.

MAILGUN_TO_ADDR.description: The address to send emails to, e.g. `admin@foobar.org`.

MAIL_ON_SUCCESS.description: Send an email when a successful donation occurs.

MAIL_ON_FAILURE.description: Send an email when an error occurs.
